summary.Title: Batching Plant Assistant, Germany
summary.Presentation:
Do you want to be a part of an extraordinary and exciting infrastructure project? We are currently looking for a part-time Batching Plant Assistant for the German side of the project.
W

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to be a part of an extraordinary and exciting infrastructure project? We are currently looking for a part-time Batching Plant Assistant for the German side of the project.

Who is FLC?

FLC is the Joint Venture in charge of the design and construction of the longest immersed tunnel in the world at 18 kilometres. It’s a complex project consisting of Tunnel North Contract & Tunnel South Contract (TUN) and the Tunnel Portal and Ramps Contract (TPR).

The project offers a varied everyday life in a multicultural, fast-growing organization, where personal, social, and working development is encouraged.

Key tasks:

You will support the concrete production department on the following:

  • Disposition of concrete deliveries with the construction site and the concrete plant.
  • Ordering/disposition of material deliveries by ship and truck.
  • Monitoring of unloading processes/coordination.
  • Repairs and cleaning of systems in concrete production.
Qualifications:
  • Knowledge of concrete production and construction sites is an advantage.
  • Technical understanding.
  • Flexible working hours as required.
  • Completed vocational training.
  • Driver's license.
  • Fluent in German, English is an advantage.
Employment conditions:

You will be offered a part-time position approx. 20 hours per week. Employment will be with one of FLC partner companies in Germany.

Workplace is Fehmarn, Germany

Application and contact:

We will invite for interviews on an ongoing basis and close for application when the right candidate has been found. Applications in German and English will be taken into consideration.

For questions related to the position please contact Concrete Production Manager Bert Luber at +45 2420 1360.
